mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.LOOP_URL AS "loopUrl", a.LOOP_TYPE AS "loopType", a.LOOP_NAME AS "loopName"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_loop_img a
a.del_flag = #{delFlag}
AND a.LOOP_URL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loopUrl}, '%')
AND a.LOOP_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loopType}, '%')
AND a.LOOP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loopName}, '%')
${sqlMap.dsf}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_loop_img( id, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag, LOOP_URL, LOOP_TYPE, LOOP_NAME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{loopUrl}, #{loopType}, #{loopName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_loop_img SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}
